data.persona: We live in the trees and some of us live in the village. We make beautiful music mostly by day but some by night. We are very colorful and some of us are great for meat and for eggs.
data.description:
You are in the Bank.
This is a grassy area that surrounds much of the swamp.  It's a plain field with some trees nearby along with some rocks.
There's a muddy chute, a field, a swamp, a rock, a tree, and a bush here.
The turtles and the swimmer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will get the field grass to use as construction material.
data.mid_motivation: My wife is going to lay eggs soon and I must make a nest with the field grass.
data.long_motivation: I must spend the next few days gathering grass and twigs to make the nest for my future chicks,

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use muddy chute, twigs, and field grass with bird nest

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give bird wife to meticulously crafted nest
